channel.title: love Archives - The New Vibes
channel.description: Your source for the latest trends in business, Technology, Marketing, Lifestyle, Candid Vibez, Energy, and Health. With our fresh perspective and innovative approach, we bring you the insights and inspiration you need to thrive and be more productive in today's fast-paced world. Join our community and start creating the future you want today wherever you find yourself!

item.title: Self-Love and Productivity: How to Prioritize Your Goals and Achieve Success on Your Own Terms
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Do you ever feel like you’re not doing enough? That you’re not productive enough? That you’re not achieving enough? It’s easy to fall into the trap of comparing yourself to others and feeling like you’re not measuring up. But what if we told you that self-love is the key to unlocking your productivity potential?  When...

The post Self-Love and Productivity: How to Prioritize Your Goals and Achieve Success on Your Own Terms appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: Disentanglement
item.dc:creator: Sianokie
item.description:
I’m guessing everyone does a relationship check every once in a while to evaluate which relationships to redefine, which ones to halt, and which ones to continue. I don’t know how I got here, 4 months of being single and I was already drowning in situationships and entanglements. I usually would issue a disclaimer that...

The post Disentanglement appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: Ex or nEXt
item.dc:creator: Sianokie
item.description:
Moving on from a past relationship can be difficult. The Ex or nEXt game can provide a fun and interactive way for individuals to reflect on their past relationship while also helping them move on to a positive future. Learn more about this game and how it can benefit you.

The post Ex or nEXt appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: Being Single: A Guy’s Perspective.
item.dc:creator: Sianokie
item.description:
Being single can be a great time of self-discovery and personal growth for men. Explore a guy's perspective on single life, relationships, and love.

The post Being Single: A Guy’s Perspective. appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: You don’t like children? Are you a monster?
item.dc:creator: Sianokie
item.description:
Not everyone likes children, and that's okay. Being child-free is a valid and respectable lifestyle choice. However, it's important to understand how to navigate social situations with families in a respectful and courteous manner. Learn more about this topic here.

The post You don’t like children? Are you a monster? appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: Busy Bae
item.dc:creator: Sianokie
item.description:
As usual, I was looking for a dramatic title and I settled on Busy Bae. It rhymes with busy bee, don’t you think? lol. Anyway, I have 3 scenarios for you: Scene 1 Girl: hey, can we take a trip this weekend? Boy: Babe, that would have been lovely but there’s so much going on...

The post Busy Bae appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: Slumpy Sunday
item.dc:creator: Sianokie
item.description:
It’s 5 pm Sunday and the daylight is beginning to fade. You just had two days of oxygen, a pleasant break from the pressures of 8 am-5 pm/Monday to Friday. But as the day slowly makes way for the night, it dawns on you that you aren’t ready to begin the week. You suddenly fall...

The post Slumpy Sunday appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: Are You My Type?
item.dc:creator: Sianokie
item.description:
I like my men a certain way. Some people tend to think that I have daddy issues but the truth is, I simply think they’re easily relatable. When it comes to relationships of any kind, I always choose the easy way out. I prefer male friendships to female ones because they’re less dramatic and I...

The post Are You My Type? appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: For Better, For Better
item.dc:creator: Sianokie
item.description:
My parents got divorced when I could barely recite my ABCs. I didn’t see much of a happy marriage so growing up, my views on marriage have been somewhat unconventional. It is still something I admire from afar though. Someday I’d want to join the club of people who don’t mind waking up to the...

The post For Better, For Better appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: Project Save Ghc15 A Day
item.dc:creator: Sianokie
item.description:
Earlier this week GHC15 trended. What started as a mere suggestion on saving tips to help guys give their girlfriends befitting birthday presents turned out to have infuriated the guys instead. Reading some of the comments, I wondered if some of these guys had girlfriends. It’ll be disheartening to see your boyfriend’s tweet suggesting that...

The post Project Save Ghc15 A Day appeared first on The New Vibes.
